name: Congming Gao
content: Congming Gao - Xiamen University Welcome to Congming Gao's Homepage! Congming Gao Ph.D., Associate Professor School of Information Science, Institute of Artificial Intelligence, Xiamen University Contact Information: Email: gaocm@xmu.edu.cn; gaocm92@gmail.com Address: Room 227, Building #3, School of Informatics, Xiang'an Campus, Xiamen University, 361102. News [2025/08]We won the Best Paper Award of IEEE NVMSA 2025 [2025/01]I have been selected for the 10th Young Elite Scientists Sponsorship Program by CAST [2024/12]One paper has been accepted to FAST 2025 [2024/08]One paper has been accepted to ACM TACO [2024/08]We won the Best Paper Award of IEEE NVMSA 2024 [2024/07]One paper has been accepted to MICRO 2024 [2024/07]One paper has been accepted to ACM TOS [2024/04]One paper has been accepted to Springer JSA [2024/03]One paper has been accepted to ACM TOS [2023/12]One paper has been accepted to ACM TACO [2023/11]One paper has been accepted to DATE 2024 [2023/10]One paper has been accepted to HPCA 2024 [2023/10]One paper has been accepted to ISPA 2023 [2023/09]One paper has been accepted to ASP-DAC 2024 [2023/02]One paper has been accepted to DAC 2023 [2022/11]One paper has been accepted to DATE 2023 (Extended Abstract) [2022/10]One paper has been accepted to HPCA 2023 [2022/09]One paper has been accepted to IEEE TCAD [2021/08]One proposal is funded by National Natural Science Foundation of China (Youth Program) [2021/08]One paper has been accepted to ACM TOS [2021/07]One paper has been accepted to MICRO 2021 [2021/06]One proposal is funded by China Postdoctoral Science Foundation (Special Program) [2020/12]One paper has been accepted to FAST 2021 [2020/10]One proposal is funded by China Postdoctoral Science Foundation (General Program) [2020/09]One paper has been accepted to Journal of Computer Research and Development [Biography] [Research] [Publications] [Awards] [Activities] [Visitors] Biography Congming GAO is currently an Associate Professor with the School of Information Science, Xiamen University, Xiamen, China. He was a Postdoctoral Researcher with the Department of Computer Science and Technology, Tsinghua University. He received the Ph.D. degree in Computer Science with the College of Computer Science, Chongqing University, Chongqing, China. He was a Research Assistant with the Department of Computer Science, City University of Hong Kong (CityU), Kowloon, Hong Kong. He was a Visiting Researcher with the Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering, University of Pittsburgh (PITT), Pittsburgh, PA, USA. Research My research topics include Flash Memory, Embedded System and Emerging Non-volatile Memory.
